title: Dupuytren's Contracture Treatment
content: Dupuytren's contracture is a progressive fibroproliferative disorder affecting the palmar fascia. Observation is appropriate for early disease without functional limitation. Needle aponeurotomy, collagenase injection, or surgical fasciectomy are interventional options based on disease severity and distribution. Post-intervention hand therapy with splinting and exercises is essential to maintain gains in extension and function.
